reference.title: Configuring and starting the master host

section.p: This chapter includes the procedures for configuring on the master host, describes the configuration options that apply to the master host, and includes steps for starting the master host for the first time. Before installing on delegate hosts, perform the procedures in this chapter.
Many configuration choices depend on application requirements. Before configuring on the master host, review your application documentation.
This chapter includes synopses of the configuration variables that affect the master host. For more information about a variable, see .
